name: Infinite Mac Disk Image
summary: An INFINITEMACDISK file is a disk image created by Infinite Mac, an online Classic Mac OS emulator . It is an exported copy of an Infinite Mac user's Saved HD virtual drive. Users can create and open INFINITEMACDISK files with versions 2.1 and above of Infinite Mac.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: INFINITEMACDISK file open in Infinite Mac
images.alt: INFINITEMACDISK file open in Infinite Mac
